renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/MljBzt

#define mainImage(O,u)                                       \
    O.a = length( O.xy = u+u - iResolution.xy) / 30. ;   \
    O += 5.* max( cos( 6.3*O ), cos( 9.* (atan(O.x,O.y) -iTime *floor(O-5.) ) * exp2(floor(log2(O))) )).a - 4. -O


        
/** // 155 chars

#define mainImage(O,u)                                       \
    float l = length( O.xy = u+u - iResolution.xy) / 30. ;   \
    O += 5.* max( cos( 6.3*l ), cos( 9.* (atan(O.x,O.y) -iTime *floor(l-5.) ) * exp2(floor(log2(l))) )) - 4. -O

/**/
  
  
        
        
/** // 167 chars

#define mainImage(O,u)                  \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,            \
         U = u+u - R;                   \
    float l = 10.* length(U) / R.y,     \
          a = atan(U.x,U.y) - iTime *floor(l-5.); \
    O += 9.* max( cos( 6.3*l ), cos( 9.*a * exp2(floor(log2(l))) )) - 8.
        
/**/
renderpass.name: Image
